name: Ammo Scavenger
pages: Ammo Scavenger is an enchantment for standard Sharp Weapons or LimaTech equipment. This enchantment increases the weight of the rarer ammo canister types in the ammo drop loot table. At $(o)Level 4$(), there's a 50% for a second canister to drop. $(o)Levels 5+$() guarantee an extra drop.

Level 3 is the maximum level obtainable through the standard enchantment table. Higher levels must be obtained via Equipment Upgrades or another source of enchantments capable of going above the standard max levels.
